title: OHS Class of 1995/1996/1997 - 20 Year Reunion
desc: We're proud to announce that the '95 alum will also be taking part in the OHS reunion extravaganza! We hope everyone understands that by uniting all of our graduating classes together, it will hopefully gain more interest with each individual in this group, have more participation, and most importantly, lower the costs to attend the event. More details to come in the following weeks, and once we get location options, then we all can decide which one fits best for our reunion bash! *
